data.text: @SenHydeSmith The factories that produces all those ducks are the northern states. Our limits are a fraction of what the southern states limits are. All you do is flood timber and fields to shoot them all while we create the habitat that produces them. Fund the northern states.
@SenHydeSmith But you voted to fund fraud with the democrats. You did that too. Why not mention that “accomplishment.”
@SenHydeSmith But you can’t vote for the SAVE ACT?

@SenHydeSmith This neglect at these refuges has been going on for a LONG time. The leadership here is inept. There are barely any staff, including LEOs, and the illegal activity is rampant....but nice of you to finally address it in an election year for you. 😕
BTW....PASS THE SAVE AMERICA ACT

@SenHydeSmith HEY, how about you worthless politicians stop jerking around with your endless bullshit priorities and finally take care of the American combat-wounded and disabled veterans you sent to get blown up, shot, burned, and maimed in the first place? We did our damn job—bled, suffered,
@SenHydeSmith After refusing to nuke the filibuster for the past 12 months, you’ve wrapped up a subpar year of doing nothing
